messages.message: can anyone explain me what i did wrong in my questions regarding date comparison?

looks like a model mistake
clearly model had all the required information to answer correctly

I would either try with GPT4 or try to add kind of step-by-step mechanism
ideally also you could ask to output the results in the structured format
e.g.
```Compute how many months are between the document date and 16.05.2023 and tell if the difference is more than 3 months

Generate output in JSON format
{'month_diff': <int representing the difference>,
'is_greater_than_3m' <bool representing whether the difference is greater than 3 months>
}
```json```
